name: ChanceLord
description:
You must escape from the temple of Bool. Don't rely on pure luck... create your own luck!!

Whenever you jump, you'll summon a die block with different behaviours. Make good use of them to reach the exit on each room.

Controls: arrows to move.

Dice:

- 1:  lasts less than a seconds, explodes and kill foes.

- 2: higher position

- 3: lower position

- 4: same height, left-right move

- 5: up and down move.

- 6: static high
